_metadata.description: ERN Network Scraper Configuration - EXPERT + GUIDELINE + SITE + PATIENT Focus
priority_content: EXPERTS - doctors, researchers, specialists with their expertise areas
GUIDELINES - clinical practice guidelines, protocols, care pathways
SITES - hospitals, centers, institutions, member networks
PATIENTS - patient information, resources, support materials

ERN-BOND.name: European Reference Network on Rare Bone Diseases
ERN-BOND.full_description: A network focusing on rare skeletal disorders, bone fragility and metabolic bone diseases.
ERN-BOND.disease_area: Rare bone disorders, skeletal dysplasias, metabolic bone diseases

ERN-CRANIO.name: European Reference Network on Craniofacial Anomalies and ENT Disorders
ERN-CRANIO.full_description: European Reference Network on craniofacial anomalies and ear, nose and throat (ENT) disorders.

ERN-EuroBloodNet.name: European Reference Network on Rare Haematological Diseases
ERN-EuroBloodNet.full_description: A network focusing on rare blood disorders, including complex and ultra-rare conditions requiring highly specialized expertise.
ERN-EuroBloodNet.disease_area: Rare haematological diseases, rare blood disorders, complex and ultra-rare blood conditions

Endo-ERN.name: European Reference Network on Rare Endocrine Conditions
Endo-ERN.full_description: European Reference Network on endocrine conditions including rare hormonal and metabolic endocrine disorders.

ERN-EpiCARE.name: European Reference Network on Rare and Complex Epilepsies
ERN-EpiCARE.full_description: European Reference Network on epilepsies, focusing on rare and complex epileptic conditions.

ERKNet.name: European Rare Kidney Diseases Reference Network
ERKNet.full_description: A collaborative network dedicated to rare and complex kidney disorders across all ages.
ERKNet.disease_area: Rare kidney diseases, complex kidney disorders across all ages

ERNICA.name: European Reference Network on Rare Inherited and Congenital Anomalies
ERNICA.full_description: European Reference Network on inherited and congenital anomalies affecting various organ systems.

ERN-LUNG.name: European Reference Network on Respiratory Diseases
ERN-LUNG.full_description: European Reference Network on respiratory diseases including rare lung conditions.
ERN-LUNG.disease_area: Rare respiratory diseases, rare lung conditions

ERN-Skin.name: European Reference Network on Rare and Undiagnosed Skin Disorders
ERN-Skin.full_description: European Reference Network on skin disorders including rare dermatological conditions.

ERN-EURACAN.name: European Reference Network on Adult Cancers (Solid Tumours)
ERN-EURACAN.full_description: European Reference Network on adult cancers focusing on solid tumours.
ERN-EURACAN.disease_area: Adult solid tumours, rare adult cancers

ERN-eUROGEN.name: European Reference Network on Rare Urogenital Diseases and Conditions
ERN-eUROGEN.full_description: European Reference Network on urogenital diseases and conditions.

ERN-EURO-NMD.name: European Reference Network on Neuromuscular Diseases
ERN-EURO-NMD.full_description: A network specializing in rare inherited and acquired neuromuscular disorders.
ERN-EURO-NMD.disease_area: Neuromuscular diseases, inherited and acquired neuromuscular disorders

ERN-EYE.name: European Reference Network on Eye Diseases
ERN-EYE.full_description: European Reference Network on eye diseases including rare ophthalmological conditions.

ERN-GENTURIS.name: European Reference Network on Genetic Tumour Risk Syndromes
ERN-GENTURIS.full_description: European Reference Network on genetic tumour risk syndromes including hereditary cancer predisposition.
ERN-GENTURIS.disease_area: Genetic tumour risk syndromes, hereditary cancer predisposition

ERN-GUARD-HEART.name: European Reference Network on Diseases of the Heart
ERN-GUARD-HEART.full_description: A network that addresses rare cardiomyopathies, arrhythmia syndromes and other inherited cardiac conditions.
ERN-GUARD-HEART.disease_area: Rare cardiac diseases, cardiomyopathies, arrhythmia syndromes, inherited cardiac conditions

ERN-ITHACA.name: European Reference Network on Rare Congenital Malformations and Rare Intellectual Disability
ERN-ITHACA.full_description: European Reference Network on congenital malformations and rare intellectual disability.

MetabERN.name: European Reference Network on Hereditary Metabolic Disorders
MetabERN.full_description: A network covering rare inherited metabolic diseases affecting multiple organs and systems.
MetabERN.disease_area: Hereditary metabolic disorders, inherited metabolic diseases

ERN-PaedCan.name: European Reference Network on Paediatric Cancer
ERN-PaedCan.full_description: European Reference Network on paediatric cancer including haemato-oncology.

ERN-RARE-LIVER.name: European Reference Network on Rare Hepatological Diseases
ERN-RARE-LIVER.full_description: European Reference Network on hepatological diseases including rare liver conditions.

ERN-ReCONNET.name: European Reference Network on Rare Connective Tissue and Musculoskeletal Diseases
ERN-ReCONNET.full_description: European Reference Network on connective tissue and musculoskeletal diseases.

ERN-RITA.name: European Reference Network on Rare Immunodeficiency, Autoinflammatory and Autoimmune Diseases
ERN-RITA.full_description: A network for rare primary immunodeficiencies, autoinflammatory and systemic autoimmune diseases.
ERN-RITA.disease_area: Immunodeficiency, autoinflammatory, autoimmune diseases, primary immunodeficiencies

ERN-TRANSPLANT-CHILD.name: European Reference Network on Transplantation in Children
ERN-TRANSPLANT-CHILD.full_description: European Reference Network on Transplantation in Children covering all aspects of pediatric organ transplantation.

VASCERN.name: European Reference Network on Rare Multisystemic Vascular Diseases
VASCERN.full_description: European Reference Network on Rare Multisystemic Vascular Diseases.

ERN-RND.name: European Reference Network on Rare Neurological Diseases
ERN-RND.full_description: European Reference Network on Rare Neurological Diseases covering various rare neurological conditions.

Handbook_00_Introduction.description: Overview of the ERN CPG and CDST development framework

Handbook_01_Prioritisation.title: Prioritisation of Rare Diseases that Require CPGs or CDSTs
Handbook_01_Prioritisation.description: Methodology for prioritizing conditions for guideline development

Handbook_02_Appraisal.title: Appraisal of Existing CPGs and CDSTs
Handbook_02_Appraisal.description: Framework for evaluating quality of existing guidelines using AGREE II

Handbook_03_Adaptation.title: Adaptation and Adoption of CPGs and CDSTs
Handbook_03_Adaptation.description: Process for adapting guidelines for ERN use

Handbook_04_CPG_Development.title: Development of Clinical Practice Guidelines for Rare Diseases
Handbook_04_CPG_Development.description: Full methodology for developing new CPGs

Handbook_05_Consensus.title: Development of Clinical Consensus Statements
Handbook_05_Consensus.description: Methodology for developing expert consensus statements

Handbook_06_Evidence_Reports.title: Elaboration of Evidence Reports
Handbook_06_Evidence_Reports.description: Systematic review methodology for rare diseases

Handbook_07_Pathways.title: Development of Diagnostic, Monitoring and Therapeutic Pathways

Handbook_09_Dos_Donts.title: Development of Do's and Don'ts Factsheets
Handbook_09_Dos_Donts.description: Quick reference fact sheets for clinicians

Handbook_12_Implementation.title: Implementation and Evaluation of CPGs and CDSTs

Handbook_13_Patient_Involvement.title: Patients' Involvement in CPG Development
Handbook_13_Patient_Involvement.description: Guide for patient engagement in guideline development
